send.subject: I saw this posting on the board
send.body:
Hey Mark,

I saw your post on the message board and I was wondering if you still had that item available. Can you call me if you still do?

Thanks,
Gary Lewis
send.repalymessagemessage: hey hey boy how are you to day
hey hey boy how are you to day
